body.name: Camco Broom and Dustpan for RVs, Adjustable from 24 to 52 Inches (43623-A)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 40 mins
features: Adjustable Broom and Dustpan: Our patented RV broom goes from a 52" long full-size broom and telescopes down to a 24" small broom; the handle length is adjustable as well
Optimal Cleaning: The soft-bristled head of the broom adjusts to different angles for maximum cleaning power in hard-to-reach places
Portable and Compact: The handy dustpan clips onto the broom handle, offering an easy and compact storage option
Multiple Uses: This broom and dustpan set is ideal for RV, marine, and home use
Quality Products: Camco makes quality products for RVing, boating, camping, towing, tailgating, and grilling that help take your passion for the outdoors to the next level
body.description: Camco's RV Broom and Dustpan Set goes from a full-size long broom and telescopes down to a short broom made for compact storage. Its soft-bristle head adjusts to different angles for maximum cleaning power and the handle length is adjustable as well. The dustpan clips onto the broom's handle for easy storage. Camco has been creating your favorite outdoor products since 1966, earning a reputation for providing superior goods with high customer approval.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Camco Adjustable Broom and Dustpan Camco RV Adjustable Broom and Dustpan goes from a full size broom and telescopes down to store compactly. Soft-bristled head adjusts to different angles for maximum cleaning power. Handle length is adjustable, too! Handy dustpan clips onto broom handle for storage. 52-inches long broom telescopes down to just 24-inches for compact storage

About Camco Manufacturing Our Brands: Our diverse flagship brands include: Rhino, TastePURE, Hydro Life, TST, Power Grip, Eaz-Lift, Life is Better at the Campsite, FasTen, Black Boar, Currituck, Kuuma, Olympian, TRAC, Crooked Creek and Camping Essentials. Camco makes quality products for RVing, boating, camping, towing, tailgating, grilling and more. Our products help take your passion for the outdoors to the next level. At heart, Camco is a small company with big aspirations. Since 1966, we have earned a reputation for providing superior goods with high customer approval. We also work with inventors, entrepreneurs and small businesses to bring innovative products into the marketplace. At our core, we believe in manufacturing exceptional products and delivering superior service – all while providing a great customer experience. Our company headquarters is located in Greensboro, North Carolina. Camco also has numerous manufacturing facilities in the United States and around the globe. Explore your outdoor passion with Camco. Great memories are only an adventure away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for the van
reviews.reviewText: We mounted a Command broom holder in our small closet and it fits in there perfectly. It has a nice edge for getting the dirt up and the dustpan works nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great broom for camping
reviews.reviewText: I love this little broom, my husband and I go camping a lot and we use this to keep our trailer and outdoor rug cleaner. I did rate the sturdiness 3 stars because my father in law wanted to check it out and pressed the button and pulled the broom further than it should go but it broke pretty easily so we had to buy another one. Once my father in law broke it, the button would not work and the broom would just flop around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice collapsible broom with acceptable shortcomings
reviews.reviewText: We use this broom in our RV. It is the best we have found but is not without shortcomings. This is our second purchase of this broom. The first one lasted 5 years, so we are not complaining and did purchase the same one a second time. THE GOOD POINTS: It takes up very little space. The handle is long enough - I am 5’8” and don’t need to bend over to use it. The angle on the broom head is good for sweeping back and forth. It is inexpensive so when it finally fails you are not out a bunch of money. THE BAD POINTS: The extensions lock in place by extending them and twisting to tighten. Sometimes when sweeping a lock might loosen and require retightening. I suppose I could twist tighten them more aggressively, but am concerned I might break them because.... After five years of use, all three tightening mechanisms failed. I had to duct tape them until I could get a replacement. BOTTOM LINE: In spite of the limitations this collapsible broom is a handy, convenient, small device with a low enough price point to accept the shortcomings and limited life span. If you have an RV with limited storage for long items and want a broom, this might nicely fill your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact Broom for Storage in Vehicle.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this compact broom for use in my Mail Vehicle. It is reasonably sturdy, and is also nicely compact. It folds down to a compact unit I am able to hang out of the way. It unfolds easily for when I want to sweep out the back of my van. The bristles are firm and do a good job, but I would not call them stiff. It took a little bit to get used to the fact that the broom folds out to ONE SIDE and is not centered as usual. The broom does a decent job but I cannot claim to use it every day. It was just what I was looking for "A Small Compact, occasional Broom" . It was well worth the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Have to keep re-tightening it
reviews.reviewText: I do love this broom, but it tends to collapse while I’m sweeping causing me to take a quick break to tighten it all up again and and again. But I do love how compact it is. Perfect for our little camper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly sturdy, great for a traveling cleaning kit
reviews.reviewText: I feared flimsiness, I didn't need to. I found the mechanism a bit fidgety but once opened up and clamped down it was more stable than I'd expected, and being able to change up the length as needed is nice--each section can be clamped individually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nice idea but with one MAJOR flaw making it worthless
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to store this broom in an outdoor cabinet I have to make sweeping up my sidewalk easier. The telescoping handle fit the bill since the cabinet is 2 ft wide, and the broom when fully closed is less than that. It seems like the perfect solution to my dilemma.I could not have been more wrong.The handle telescopes as advertised, but like other reviewers before me have mentioned, there is no way to lock the broom head in place. It flops around like a flag in the breeze when you're trying to sweep a surface. Rendering the broom basically useless.Even if you're super careful, and don't lift the broom head off the ground, and hold the handle just right, you might be able to sweep something up for a few brush strokes. But that's a lot of limitations when you're trying to use a broom to clean the sidewalk. If there was a way to make the head on this product lock, it would be a 5-star product. But with no way to do that, it renders the broom useless.I'm kind of mad at myself for keeping it and letting the vendor have my money. I guess there was some small part of me that hoped I was missing something, or that it would get easier to use over time. It did not, and I have a basically useless product.I thought about a fixing to head of the broom permanently in the brush position, but if I do that, it will make the overall length of the broom too big to fit into my cabinet. So basically unless I can come up with some solution that I can make the broom head snap into place when I wanted to, and then fold it down when I need it to be smaller, there's no hope for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super handy broom to have in your RV
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy I bought this broom. I keep it in the pass-through for use outside. I've used it for sweeping off our mats, and for brushing leaves off the awning as we pack up from a campsite. It's super handy.The only real complaint I have - and this is more a problem with the style of locking mechanism all these products use - is that it's pretty easy to twist the broom and loosen the handle a bit. This isn't Camco's fault, it's just how those friction tightening poles work.I like that you can have the broom head vertical or horizontal to the handle, it just adds to the usefulness.
Compact for easy RV storage. Works great
Pratica e funzionale, la teniamo in roulotte piegata in un mobiletto durante gli spostamenti, aperta ed appesa fuori durante le soste...
Très pratique mais les blocages des trois parties se grippent rapidement et vous n’arrivez plus à l’ouvrir complètement. Il perd beaucoup de son intérêt. A éviter
I needed a broom that would fit in a normal cupboard and this collapses down beautifully.
